publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3883 Patrick Harvie: Report on Inquiry into the Potential Benefits of High-speed Rail Services—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee’s 1st Report, 2009 (Session 3): Report on the Inquiry into the potential benefits of high-speed rail services (SP Paper 219).
